| A bullet ant:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* can [lay eggs](/wiki/Oviparous "Oviparous").
* is [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") to eat.
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile"). |                                                                                                        |

The **bullet ant** is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"). Bullet ants are very similar to [soldier ants](/wiki/Soldier_ants "Soldier ants"), but are slightly stronger and have constitution poison.

## Encyclopedia Entry

This giant variety of the ordinary ant will fight just as  
fiercely as its small, distant cousin. Various varieties  
exist, and they are known and feared for their relentless  
persecution of their victims.

This page was automatically generated by a modified version of nhtohtml version 2.05w
html:
Bullet ant

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
a bullet ant
Difficulty 8
Attacks Sting 5d4 poisonous (constitution)
a bullet ant
Difficulty 8
Attacks

Sting 5d4 poisonous (constitution)

Base level 4
Base experience 27
Speed 18
Base AC 3
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 2, appears in small groups
Genocidable Yes
Weight 20
Nutritional value 5
Size Tiny
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed poison (26%)

A bullet ant:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.

The bullet ant is a monster in SpliceHack. Bullet ants are very similar to soldier ants, but are slightly stronger and have constitution poison.



Encyclopedia Entry

This giant variety of the ordinary ant will fight just as
fiercely as its small, distant cousin. Various varieties
exist, and they are known and feared for their relentless
persecution of their victims.

This page was automatically generated by a modified version of nhtohtml version 2.05w

The '''bullet ant''' is a [[monster]] in [[SpliceHack]]. Bullet ants are very similar to [[soldier ants]], but are slightly stronger and have constitution poison.

{{encyclopedia|	This giant variety of the ordinary ant will fight just as

	exist, and they are known and feared for their relentless
	persecution of their victims.
